lx4p

Class LXHueInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • lx4p.LXHueInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LXUPnPDelegate

    public class LXHueInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements LXUPnPDelegate
    LXHueInterface provides a network interface connection to a Phillips Hue Bridge. It is capable of locating a Phillips Hue Bridge on the network using UPnP
    Author:
    Claude Heintz

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int status
      status of connection
      java.lang.String urlBase
      the URLBase returned when querying the location URL
      java.lang.String userName
      userName string for api requests (authorized by pressing button on bridge)

    • Constructor Summary

      LXHueInterface(java.lang.String user_name)
      initialize the hue interface with a user name to use when connecting to the Hue Bridge

      void clearStatus()
      If there's been an error, tests the connection to the bridge which clears the error if it succeeds If testConnection returns error containing "unauthorized user" clearStatus will attempt to create the user The button on the Hue Bridge should be pressed before attempting to create a user.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        closes the bridgeFinder and its network socket

      • connectToBridge

        public void connectToBridge(java.lang.String address,
                            java.lang.String nicName)
        Starts the process of connecting to a Hue Bridge by finding its URL
        Parameters:
        address - the IP address to use in binding the UPnP socket corresponding to the network interface connection to the bridge
        nicName - the name of the interface to use in binding the UPnP socket eg "en0", "en1", "eth0", etc.

      • setLXUPnPDiscoverer

        public void setLXUPnPDiscoverer(LXUPnPDiscoverer d)
        method required by LXUPnPDelegate interface delegates are able to call close() which terminates a search thread
        Specified by:
        setLXUPnPDiscoverer in interface LXUPnPDelegate
        Parameters:
        d - the LXUPnPDiscoverer associated with the delegate

      • foundURLBase

        public void foundURLBase(java.lang.String u)
        method required by LXUPnPDelegate interface called
        Specified by:
        foundURLBase in interface LXUPnPDelegate
        Parameters:
        u - the URL string of the base URL for the located device

      • clearStatus

        public void clearStatus()
        If there's been an error, tests the connection to the bridge which clears the error if it succeeds If testConnection returns error containing "unauthorized user" clearStatus will attempt to create the user The button on the Hue Bridge should be pressed before attempting to create a user.

      • getHueLightsState

        public java.lang.String getHueLightsState()
        queries the Hue Bridge for the current state of the lights returns a string with the status in JSON format

      • testConnection

        public void testConnection()

      • createUser

        public boolean createUser()
        Sends a request to Hue Bridge to create a user. Should be sent AFTER pressing the button on the Hue bridge.
        Returns:
        true if request returned OK

      • setLight

        public boolean setLight(java.lang.String light,
                        java.lang.String body)
        setLight sends PUT to bridge with light parameters in body of request
        Parameters:
        light - string with number of Hue light bulb
        body - JSON String contents of PUT request
        Returns:
        true if request sent successfully

      • setLight

        public boolean setLight(int light,
                        java.lang.String body)
        setLight sends PUT to bridge with light parameters in body of request
        Parameters:
        light - number of Hue light bulb
        body - JSON String contents of PUT request
        Returns:
        true if request sent successfully

      • setLight

        public boolean setLight(java.lang.String light,
                        java.lang.String on_str,
                        java.lang.String sat_str,
                        java.lang.String bri_str,
                        java.lang.String hue_str)
        setLight sends PUT to bridge with light parameters in body of request
        Parameters:
        light - 1,2,3
        on_str - "true" or "false"
        sat_str - saturation 0-255
        bri_str - 0-255
        hue_str - 0-65535
        Returns:
        true if request sent successfully

      • setLight

        public boolean setLight(int light,
                        boolean ltsw,
                        int sat,
                        int bri,
                        int hue)
        setLight sends PUT to bridge with light parameters in body of request
        Parameters:
        light - 1,2,3
        ltsw - on/off
        sat - saturation 0-255
        bri - intensity 0-255
        hue - color 0-65535
        Returns:
        true if request sent successfully

      • params2json

        public java.lang.String params2json(java.lang.String on_str,
                                    java.lang.String sat_str,
                                    java.lang.String bri_str,
                                    java.lang.String hue_str)
        params2json assembles a JSON String from individual parameters to pass to setLight
        Parameters:
        on_str - "true" or "false"
        sat_str - saturation 0-255
        bri_str - intensity 0-255
        hue_str - color 0-65535
        Returns:
        JSON string for PUT request

      • params2json

        public java.lang.String params2json(boolean ltsw,
                                    int sat,
                                    int bri,
                                    int hue)
        params2json assembles a JSON String from individual parameters to pass to setLight
        Parameters:
        ltsw - on=true, off=false
        sat - saturation 0-255
        bri - intensity 0-255
        hue - color 0-65535
        Returns:
        JSON string for PUT request
